title: Dingbats & Lollypop Arms
description: Have you ever been followed home by a giant, psychotic seagull? What are the 79 craziest excuses for talking in class? What happens when the pages of a book go to war against each other? And why is a simple chicken soup one of life's more difficult tasks?Find out in this hilarious collection of short stories. One thing is guaranteed - you will NEVER pick the endings!Suitable for ages 8 - 12 years.
author: Tim Harris
